channel.title: Question
channel.description: how do i add a help menu lol

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commandName")) { voidHoldingTheMenu(); }

public void voidHoldingTheMenu() { clearQuestInterface(); for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) { if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { { sendQuest("@dre@stuff", 8144); //Title sendQuest("@blu@stuff", 8145); sendQuest("@red@stuff", 8147+i); } } } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @keenan009 keenan009
item.description:
@keenan009 wrote:

[quote=“zilchuary, post:4, topic:147256”][quote author=si force link=topic=201330.msg1787940#msg1787940 date=1191076535]
every server source has one
you just have to go to
client.java and edit the current text
and change it to what you want
[/quote]
not really…[/quote]
yes really… they are all stored in your client.java…u just need to find the text that you want to change and replace it with what u want and compile and run.

Read full topic
